measurement_mode.docs:
The measurement mode of the sensor. Valid options are `differential_pressure` and `mass_flow`. Defaults to `differential_pressure`.

*See also: [SDP3x / SDP800 Series Differential Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sdp3x.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [SDP3x / SDP800 Series Differential Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sdp3x.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x21`.

*See also: [SDP3x / SDP800 Series Differential Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sdp3x.html#configuration-variables)*
